location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant Thomas Blast, Bushire to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: Numerous words on each line of the right hand side of the text have been obscured owing to insect damage.

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication dated 30 January 1817 and confirming he will offer assistance to the Vestal.
